name: Sewer Surfers
description:
A, Left Arrow, Space Bar: Pull Up!

D, Right Arrow, Mouse Click: Throw Spear! towards mouse cursor

Ride the sewer waves to collect coins, and avoid the bats! (You can let them live though, it is their home.)

While riding your sewer wave, you only move forward, be sure to catch the pipe at the end of the level to safely make your escape!

Background by: Adam Saltsman - Dracula's Manor with minor adjustments.

Font by: JustFredrik - Weiholmir
